original_text: But it does not matter how much noise they make. Those people may roar like powerful waves, but the Lord will shout at them to stop. Then they will run far away! They will run like the wind as it blows chaff across the hills. It will be like a strong storm that carries away dead weeds! But it does not matter how much noise they make. Those people may roar like powerful waves, but the Lord will shout at them to stop. Then they will run far away! They will run like the wind as it blows chaff across the hills. It will be like a strong storm that carries away dead weeds!
korean_text: 열방이 충돌하기를 많은 물이 몰려옴과 같이 하나 주께서 그들을 꾸짖으시리니 그들이 멀리 도망함이 산에서 겨가 바람 앞에 흩어짐 같겠고 폭풍 앞에 떠도는 티끌 같을 것이라

sentences.original_text: But it does not matter how much noise they make
Those people may roar like powerful waves
sentences.korean_translation: 그 사람들은 강력한 파도처럼 포효할 수 있지만

sentences.original_text: but the Lord will shout at them to stop
Then they will run far away
They will run like the wind
as it blows chaff across the hills
sentences.korean_translation: 마치 바람이 언덕 너머로 겨를 날리는 것처럼

sentences.original_text: It will be like a strong storm
